pr_title: Setup firebase ml model downloader directories.

timeline.message: Setup firebase ml model downloader directories.

timeline.bodyText: Usually main entry points to the SDK have Firebase as prefix, i.e. FirebaseModelDownloader. We might have missed this in API review, worth being consistent though. pls check with the council
timeline.author: vkryachko

replies.bodyText: reaching out to api team - will likely go with FirebaseMlModelDownloader
replies.author: annzimmer

timeline.bodyText:
If you only need access to FirebaseOptions, consider depending on them directly.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        .add(Dependency.required(FirebaseApp.class))
          
          
            
                        .add(Dependency.required(FirebaseOptions.class))
          
      
    
    
  

Context: https://github.com/google/guice/wiki/InjectOnlyDirectDependencies
timeline.author: vkryachko

replies.bodyText: Updated but will likley need firebaseApp by the time the code is fully written. But I can update as needed.
replies.author: annzimmer

timeline.bodyText: please add a @hide javadoc comment to this class.
timeline.author: vkryachko

timeline.message: Update api file to remove unused field.
Update api file to update class name.
